en: 'ERROR: Program has run into an unexplained error and must close.' You've received that error five times tonight. Post on forums for help and leave off for tonight?

yes_caption: Ask for help in forums and stop here.

en: You ask for help in the forums, and by the next morning you have a solution. The program is up and running, ready for your next session.
After a lot of cursing and struggling, you get it working again. You get a bit of work done, but the frustration follows you into your dreams.
